author: Tony Tobin
method: Blend the butter and caster sugar together in a food processor. Add the flour, eggs and milk and blend lightly to combine.  Add the blackberries and blend on "high" to combine. Grease a small pudding dish and pour the sponge mixture in. Cover with cling film and microwave on full power for four minutes. To make the sauce, heat the blackberries, sugar and wine in a small pan for 3-4 minutes. Turn the pudding out onto a serving plate and spoon the sauce over to serve.
ingredients: 110g/4oz butter,  110g/4oz caster sugar,  110g/4oz self-raising flour,  2 eggs,  splash of milk,  55g/2oz blackberries,  55g/2oz blackberries,  30g/1oz caster sugar,  splash of red wine
